medical_history.chief_complaint: Chest tightness, gas, and inability to belch.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The symptoms began four hours prior to presentation after eating cornbread as a late night snack. A similar episode occurred a few months ago while eating in a restaurant, which resolved with drinking ginger ale.
medical_history.family_history: Diabetes Mellitus type II in father, Hypertension in mother.
